phrases: He is taken a real turn for the worse since this morning.
I have taken him to a number of doctors, but the because is still unknown.
As someone from a caravan fleet that makes stops at countries around the world,
I was thinking perhaps you would know a good way to treat him.
In any case, let us get him to the caravan's medical ship.
First of all, we need to get his fever down,
or else his body will be permanently damaged even if he does survive.
We are going to head to the caravan fleet for now.
Take care of things here for me.
He was so very much looking forward to his birthday celebration today...
Lately, an awful lot of people have died on the same day of the year they were born...
And there is a rumor going around that it is the work of some disease.
The deceased's ashes are returned to the Abyss together with Eternal Fortune flowers.
That funeral is for someone who passed away from this same thing...
In fact, before this child got sick,
two others at the orphanage died due to some unknown medical condition.
Counting suspicious deaths alone, the total is five now.
All of them were orphans whose birthdays were unknown...
Something as absurd as all this...
I would like to think it is just a stupid made-up story, but...
I did not even do anything.
This boy is so healthy it is hard to believe he even had a fever.
At this point, I suppose it is some kind of curse or spell...
Which reminds me, there is been something like it before - something completely absurd...
The mysterious Great Pit of the Netherworld, which is itself referred to as a curse...
Longing seizes people more powerfully than poison and more deeply than illness.
Once it catches hold of you, there is absolutely no escape.
That is quite a curse, and yet the adventurers all willingly devote themselves to its pursuit.
For them, a life without longing is more terrifying than death itself.
Sono me o tomoshibi yori kagayakasete
I Am About To kotae ga mitsukaru nara zenbu nakushitemo ii
Sono koe o hanasanai youni kodama ga mada hibiiteru
Was it the scenery of somewhere similar?
that was one of my own...
In that case, the one who was mourning for Lyza was...
No, Ozen said, No one was buried there.
Normally Mitty does not get emotionally attached to visitors, though.
They are close in age, so maybe Mitty took a liking to her.
Before becoming like this, Mitty was also a girl, you see.
Just please do not eat the mushrooms, okay?
She is not one to treat others so cruelly.
It was thanks to Mitty, after all, that we got the poison out.
That medicine was made by injecting Mitty with an orbed-piercer's poison.
Why did you do such a thing?
Mitty has the ability to neutralize poisons all on her own.
So I then used her blood to produce the medicine, you see.
Nanachi, who exactly were you two before you became Hollows?
You really want to ask that?
It is best you do not.
If you do, you are going to end up wanting to help us.
You saved us, did not you?!
Of course I will try to help-
This... was made with the ingredients I collected, correct?
Do not worry about, um, how it looks.
It has an oddly fishy scent...
What the heck kind of smell is that anyway?
I am going to take some for you too, Mitty, so you can munch on it later.
Was this truly made using those ingredients?
Nanachi, you normally eat this stuff?
Come on, do not look at me like that...
If Riko wakes up and eats this...
this time she is really going to die.
Well... if you do not like it, do not eat it.
So she is looking for her mother who descended to the bottom of the netherworld, huh?
Still, we are talking about a girl with an insatiable curiosity
and a piece of junk who cannot regain even one of his important memories...
You did well just making it this far.
Or should I say, it was actually quite hopeless...
You know of a way to evade the Curse of the Abyss, do not you?
even if I was to explain it to someone like you who cannot see it...
Besides, it is also my personal secret.
If it is in my power, I will do whatever you want in return!
Hey, do not get so close!
let us give it a shot.
I will make an exception and let you experience it yourself.
Hey, you get under here, too.
Well, it is basically a super thin piece of cloth.
It is just like this, I suppose.
The true nature of the Curse of the Abyss.
It is floaty in the same kind of way.
With layer piled upon layer, it blankets us!
Even if you touch it, you will not feel it, nor can you see it...
When we move, it moves along with us.
Simply breathing is enough to alter its flow.
S-so when you touch it, that is when you are hit by the Curse of the Abyss?
When you touch it, it simply warps...
So then what makes you get hit with the Curse?
Once you break through, the symptoms hit you all at once.
If it is just something like your fingertips, you will hardly be affected...
But when it comes to your head or chest...
If any part of you that is vital to life passes through, then...
Well, as you have seen, something seriously not good will end up happening...
Well, passing on through from above is nice and smooth.
It is got a flow to it similar to inverted thorns, making it so you cannot get out once you have entered.
It is just like a trap for catching prey.
That malice-filled floaty thing, I mean.
The one that carries light to the subterranean world while at the same time obstructing observation of it...
The one that continues to stubbornly guard the netherworld's true nature and the order within it...
That is the mysterious force field I speak of.
Filling every corner of this pit, it is the very blood of the Abyss, so to speak.
And that is the true nature of the Curse of the Abyss...
There is nowhere to escape from it.
B-but, Nanachi, did not you say the Curse was not present around your hideout?!
I took great pains to find this place.
The force field gets weaker the farther away you get from the vertical shaft.
After descending this far, do not you have somewhat of a feel for it?
Well, I suppose there are not many places as stable as this one.
That area around the Seeker Camp also...
Also, the force field is sensitive to the movements of living things.
It even responds to their very consciousnesses and alters its flow.
If you can read something is consciousness, you can anticipate its movements.
Orbed-piercers do not have great intuition...
They can actually predict the future.
The deeper you go, the denser and stronger the force field becomes.
So challenging the netherworld's bottom means continuing on a path brimming with a deadly curse,
while also going up against predators that can predict the future.
H-how in the world do cave raiders manage to still press on?
They are not even able to see it, so I wonder myself...
But, there is one thing I know.
That is just the way it is.
There is no way to stop their longing.
Did not I tell you that I would let you experience it?
That said, you have to promise me!
You need to do exactly as I say!
Nanachi, it feels like you are right next to my ear.
It is just something I happened to pick up.
I can hear your voice, but where exactly are you, Nanachi?
I can see you fine from here.
You must not come any closer!
Judging by the stuff he was carrying, he was headed back on his own when he got ambushed.
To try rescuing our new visitor?
No matter happens, you do exactly as I say.
That way you will be able to dispose of Orby and the man will be saved.
Then I will show it to you now: the world as I see it!
Okay, to start, look up and completely commit to it.
Now listen, really commit to it.
Do not worry about that guy.
You grabbed onto it, I see.
That thing you have grabbed onto is the organ it uses to sense the force field.
That is its lifeline, and without uncoupling your actions from your conscious mind,
you would never be able to even touch it.
Now that it is confused, it will go for the kill without any thought of looking graceful.
How dare you do that to Riko!
It was forced to eject a full 80 percent of its spines.
It will not be able to hunt here anymore.
More importantly, hurry up and get back here.
Do not get too close to him!
Now that Orby is gone, it is cave raiders that present the most danger to us!
Could you relay a message for me?
It is intended for a guy at Belchero Orphanage named Jiruo.
We are still continuing our adventure.
Well, you did not tell him about me, so I do not really mind...
But you sure it will be alright?
That, uh, guy at Belchero Orphanage...
If people find out he is connected to you somehow, it could spell trouble.
He is the most dependable guy I know, after all.
In any case, that was pretty amazing, Nanachi!
Using the opponent's own special ability against it like that was a brilliant strategy!
I wish you would come with us to the bottom of the netherworld!
I have something to ask of you...
You can ask anything of me!
I knew it would be, but it truly is a hard thing to ask...
Mitty, I am sorry for running away like this.
I will not just let him...
Sora ni ukanderu hikaru nami o
Tabanete niji no hashi o kakeyou
Kimi no hidarite, boku no migite o
Kako mo i am about to mo mirai mo
Kimi to issho ni iretara, sekai wa kagayakidasu yo
Saihate no chi ni saku hana o sagasou
